Package com.charliai.activities.api

Class ActivityHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.ws.rs.core.Application
      • com.charliai.activities.api.ActivityHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Conference, Expenses, Parse, Search, Travel
    public class ActivityHandler
extends javax.ws.rs.core.Application
    The ActivityHandler is a base class for all activities to extend from. This base class will provide core functionality for all activities including defined structures, utility methods, and service registration.

    TODO: Add functionality to pull the training data TODO: Add functionality to interpret the training data and determine intents supported as well as entities TODO: Create a dependency map based on the interpreted training data

    Author:
    kevincollins

      • init

        public void init​(java.lang.String classExtName,
                 java.lang.String configFile,
                 javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)
          throws ActivityException
        The init method will initialize the Class and load the configuration data for the class to operate. The initialization routine will also register the activity handler with the Register service.
        Throws:
        ActivityException - Exception when registration fails

      • registerActivity

        public void registerActivity​(ActivityConfig activity)
                      throws ActivityException
        This method registers the activity with the CharliAI registry service and assumes that the activity object has been set as part of the config file and/or as part of the init process.
        Throws:
        ActivityException

      • getClassConfigValue

        public java.lang.String getClassConfigValue​(java.lang.String key)
        This is a simple helper method to return the string value from the Class Config object. If there is no class config object, or the key does not exist, the method will return null.

        Note that this method is intended to only work with string values as these are more common for name/value configuration settings. If the developer is looking for more complex configuration settings the recommended approach is to retrieve the JSON object using getClassConfig.

        Returns:
        String value for configuration setting

      • getServiceUri

        public java.net.URI getServiceUri()
        Gets the serviceUri or endpoint associated with this service.
        Returns:
        URI of the current runtime service

      • setServiceUri

        public void setServiceUri​(java.net.URI serviceUri)
        Sets the serviceUri and is used by init to set the serviceUri (i.e. endpoint) to the runtime endpoint value.
        Parameters:
        serviceUri - URI of the current runtime service

      • getActivity

        public ActivityConfig getActivity()
        Gets the current activity object with all the activity settings and definitions.
        Returns:
        Current ActivityConfig object with activity definitions

      • setActivity

        public void setActivity​(ActivityConfig activity)
        Sets the activity object and is used to update the activity object.
        Parameters:
        activity - Current ActivityConfig object with activity definitions

      • getTrainingDataFilename

        public java.lang.String getTrainingDataFilename()
        Gets the file name for the training data associated with the activity or activities (i.e. intents). This allows activities to come pre-populated with training data to assist CharliAI in learning about new activities.
        Returns:
        String value of the training data file name

      • setTrainingDataFilename

        public void setTrainingDataFilename​(java.lang.String trainingDataFilename)
        Sets the training data file name such that the activity handler can pull the training data and register it with the system.
        Parameters:
        trainingDataFilename - String value containing the training data file name

      • getPreparedStatement

        public java.lang.String getPreparedStatement​(java.lang.String key)
        Simple helper method to get a single prepared statement from the prepared statement object.
        Parameters:
        key - String value containing the lookup value
        Returns:
        String value containing the prepared statement

      • getPreparedStatements

        public org.json.JSONObject getPreparedStatements()
        Gets the list of prepared statements associated with this activity handler. Prepared statements for each activity handler are stored in the configuration file and separated from the Java code.
        Returns:
        JSONObject with all the prepared statements

      • setPreparedStatements

        public void setPreparedStatements​(org.json.JSONObject preparedStatements)
        Standard setter for updating the prepared statements and is used during initialization to update the object based on the configuration file.
        Parameters:
        preparedStatements - JSONObject with all the prepared statements as an array

      • getClassConfig

        public org.json.JSONObject getClassConfig()
        Returns the class configuration JSON object for the activity handler.
        Returns:
        JSONObject with the class configuration data

      • setClassConfig

        public void setClassConfig​(org.json.JSONObject classConfig)
        Sets the class configuration JSON object for the activity handler, and is used as part of the init process when the class configuration is read from the configuration file.
        Parameters:
        classConfig - JSONObject with the class configuration data
